name: Delete the Demons
description:
WELCOME DEMON HUNTERS!

I invite you along on this journey to clear out the depths of this office building without injuring any of my poor, clueless employees. There are possessed souls that really just need disposed of, and you're just the person for the job!

CONTROLS
WASD: Movement
Space: Jump
E:Toggle Demon Scanner
Left Mouse Click: Capture Nearby Demon

Good luck hunters! You're gonna need it.
